#This page presents some useful (sometimes, not so useful) information about Android

= Some information about Android =

In this twiki, we present several tips about developing in Android platform. In many cases, such tips might be very basic, being interesting only for people that are just starting the studies in this platform. Therefore, we are organizing them (the tips) in several subsections.


== Basic GUI tips =


  * In Android platform, user interfaces are composed of hierarchies of classes called Views. A View is simply a drawable object, such as a combo-list, an animation, or a text box.
